features: FIT: ONLY for use with crib. Attaches to the mattress.
SWING DOWN: The patented swing down feature allows this bedrail to pivot down and out of the way when getting in and out of bed or removing sheets
SAFE: 33-inches long (hinge point) and 16-inch tall for added security. Patented Gap Guard prevents gaps between rail and mattress.
EASY TO SET UP: No tools required. Assembles quickly. Rail cover can be washed with a damp washcloth and soap.
SECURE: Anchoring strap that secures the bedrail to the bed. Designed with all steel frame. AGE: For Children 2-5 Years Old
body.description: This Swing Down Crib Rail is perfect for those restless little sleepers. The swing down feature allows the rail to swing down out of the way when not in use. The swing down function makes it very convenient for your child getting in and out of bed. This crib rail has an all-steel construction to make it very sturdy and durable. The Swing Down Crib Rail has 16" tall sidewall and is 33" Long for added security. The Exclusive Gap Guard feature prevents your child from sliding between the mattress and crib rail. It's easy to set up with no-tool required. Only for use with a crib.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Regalo Swing Down Convertible Crib Rail Sturdy Construction, Quick Installation With an all-steel construction, the Regalo Swing Down Convertible Crib Rail is ready to handle the everyday use of a little one. The crib rail measures 33” long and 16” high, to provide added security and peace of mind that your child will remain in bed throughout the night. The Regalo Swing Down Convertible Crib Rail requires no tools and assembles quickly – just align the pieces, click together and attach to the bed. Because it’s easy to assemble and disassemble, the crib rail is ideal for traveling or overnights at grandmas and once disassembled can fit in a suitcase. Convenient, Lightweight, Wipes Clean The convenient locking tabs allows you to easily change the position of the rail. To lock in place, just push the tabs down and the rail will remain in the upright position. When it’s time for your little one to get out of bed, just push up on the locking tabs and the rail will swing down out of your way. The fabric is easy to clean - wipe with a damp washcloth or throw in the washing machine. What’s Included in The Box White, Durable Mesh Nylon Fabric WallRight Upper Support BarLeft Upper Support BarRight Bottom Support BarLeft Bottom Support BarRight Swing Lock and Strap AssemblyLeft Swing Lock and Strap Assembly Dimensions: 33”L x 16”H Attaches to the mattress Only one Convertible Crib Rail can be used on a bed Patented Gap Guard prevents gaps between rail and mattress Rail swings down and out of the way when not in use No tools required for assembly Rail cover can be washed with damp washcloth and soap Sturdy, all metal frame

A Closer Look at the Regalo Convertible Crib Rail Swing Down Functionality With just a push of a button the rail swings down and out of the way. Gap Guard Protection The crib rail features our patented Gap Guard protection. preventing gaps from forming between the rail and mattress, so you're child doesn't slip in between. Durable Construction The frame is made of an all-steel construction and covered with a durable mesh nylon fabric. Perfect for a Crib The Crib Rail is the ideal size for a convertible crib or toddler sized bed.

About Us Regalo Baby is a family-owned company based in Burnsville, Minnesota. Because we are parents too, we understand the importance of safe, convenient products that make life with your little one easier and more fun.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps the kids in bed and not on the floor.
reviews.reviewText: My kids' bed railing was pretty short so I got them one of these. My 5 year old is a roller, so I was worried. It works great though, fits into the frame, and is sturdy enough for him to push against and not fall. Overall is a great product and was easy to assemble. I like the detachable mesh too since it's easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I Bought this for my daughter, and it works great! We have not had any problems with it. It’s great quality, super easy to use, and easy to put together. The little levers on the sides, make it super easy to lay down if you want to make the bed. The cover is very easy to zip off to wash and put back on. I feel very safe knowing it’s on the bed..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This bed rail was ok. I wished it was a bit more snug to the bed. Still not flush with the bed even though I used the attached straps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love that is extra long!
reviews.reviewText: The Regalo Swing Down 54-Inch Extra Long Bed Rail Guard has proven to be a reliable and secure addition to our toddler's bed. The extra-long size provides ample coverage, ensuring our little one stays safe throughout the night. The swing-down feature adds convenience, allowing for easy access to the bed when needed. The reinforced anchor safety system gives us peace of mind, knowing that the rail is securely in place. Installation was straightforward, and the sturdy construction of the bed rail adds durability. The design is unobtrusive, blending seamlessly with the bed frame. Overall, the Regalo Swing Down Bed Rail Guard is a practical and essential safety measure for parents transitioning their child to a big-kid bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Changed a crib to a toddler bed thanks to this
reviews.reviewText: My daughter began showing that she was able to climb out of her crib. So, we removed one side of the crib and replaced it with this. Installation was easy once you figured it out. Sturdy enough to hold a sleeping baby, but not sturdy enough to climb on. And to be fair, my daughter never tried to. Can be opened and closed for access. It did not cover the whole side of the crib, so we just leave it up and my daughter climbs through the gaps. It's a good intermediary step of going from a crib to a toddler bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t work with a crib with a front support like the picture.
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to assemble, (the trick is that the hole for the push pin on the “legs” under the bed rotates… so double check the instructions. Even with trying to figure it out took about two minutes to assemble. I really wanted this to work because it is significantly cheaper than my other option which I will now pursue because it doesn’t work with my crib we bought from Target. Because the mattress sits on metal grate thing, and also sits flush with the bottom front rail there is no room for the foldable “joint” to sit other than on that front rail. This lifts up the front of the mattress which would not even be a bid deal except it will eventually damage my crib. I also want to point out that the straps are great except there is no room between the crib and the platform to accommodate the bulky anchors. Something flat that could pass under the mattress and be flat against the opposite side of the mattress from the rail would be better. The anchors kind of fit in the corner of the crib but that is not how it’s designed.We have the newton mattress and the delta children’s Jordan 4 in 1 convertible crib from target.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works perfectly! Was hoping I’d be able to use this on a twin bed as well when we move to a bigger bed, but the smaller size does not give much protection at all for a twin size mattress. However, happy that different sizes are available at affordable prices. This one’s fits our toddler mattress perfectly. My little one loves his “big boy bed”!

reviews.reviewerName: A bit of assembly was required, but instructions were clear and easy to follow. I have 2 cats and the bin is large enough that I typically have to empty it about every 4-5 days. Comes with a large roll of bin liners and 2 fresh scent pods. The unit functions very quietly is quite attractive. MUCH better than an open pan of litter sitting around! The app that is tied to my phone is very handy, but only works when at home, so if I'm away, I don't get notifications on a problem. I'm very pleased with this purchase!
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works really well
reviews.reviewText: Time to move the grandkiddos to a bed and this keeps them safe. I like the netting instead of the old rails and the fact that I can fold it down to change sheets makes it super handy! I used to have to remove the whole bedrail assembly to change sheets. Assembly was easy and it can even be used on a futon bed!
Resistente y fácil de armar y desarmar para lavar.
Lo he colocado en la cama de mi hijo y nos encanto, súper seguro, resistente, y fácil de colocar
Nice ans long and sturdy, easy to set up.

reviews.reviewTitle: This works great for bunk beds with a toddler
reviews.reviewText: We use this on the bottom bunk so my toddler doesn’t roll out and it’s very sturdy and well made. Good price point too.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works perfectly for a baby crib
reviews.reviewText: This fits perfectly and with the same mattress.The assembling procedure was dead simple without the need of any tools, it feels solid and you can remove and wash the mesh when it's dirty, so that's practical.
